quote: Men are equal; it is not birth but virtue that makes the difference. – Voltaire
fact: The citrus soda 7-UP was created in 1929; `7` was selected after the original 7-ounce containers and `UP` for the direction of the bubbles.
joke: Yesterday a clown held a door open for me. I thought it was a nice jester.
